projects.title: "I've always felt like I belong here at Bridge and I think a big part of that is you. You always invited me to tag along to lunches or sit with you in the cafe. Even through the pandemic I never had to feel alone because I could always reach out to you on slack. You've shown me what it means to be inclusive and also how to be a good friend. Thank you for your thoughtfulness, Bridge is so lucky to have you!"
"The Justin factor is everything. I truly mean that. I always thought you would pivot into a relationship-heavy role. Such a strength of yours."

"Developers are generally a grouchy, wall-hugging, and pessimistic lot. Justin's positive attitude is constant, and he's always looking for the good in folks and finding ways to reach across departments to build bridges."

image.alt: Coworkers hosting a Santa clause event
